name: Molecularevolutionaryanalysis
tagline: Computational Molecular Evolution - learning about how and why DNA and protein sequences evolve. learning the theory behind methods for building and analyzing phylogenetic trees, and get hands-on experience with some widely used software packages AND developing new ideas and tools.
body: > Computational Molecular Evolution - learning about how and why DNA and protein sequences evolve. learning the theory behind methods for building and analyzing phylogenetic trees, and get hands-on experience with some widely used software packages AND developing new ideas and tools.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
